summary.name: Brandon Johnson
summary.description: Innovative and deadline-driven Graphic Designer with 3+ years of experience designing and developing user-centered digital/print marketing material from initial concept to final, polished deliverable.

professionalExperience.title: Senior graphic design specialist
responsibilities: Lead in the design, development, and implementation of the graphic, layout, and production communication materials
Delegate tasks to the 7 members of the design team and provide counsel on all aspects of the project.
Supervise the assessment of all graphic materials in order to ensure quality and accuracy of the design
Oversee the efficient use of production project budgets ranging from $2,000 - $25,000

professionalExperience.title: Graphic design specialist
professionalExperience.company: Stepping Stone Advertising, New York, NY
responsibilities: Developed numerous marketing programs (logos, brochures,infographics, presentations, and advertisements).
Managed up to 5 projects or tasks at a given time while under pressure
Recommended and consulted with clients on the most appropriate graphic design
Created 4+ design presentations and proposals a month for clients and account managers
